byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from the United Nations.

abstract: Pres Obama says at news conference with South Korean Pres Park Geun-hye at White House that he is ready to open negotiations with North Korea about reducing sanctions if country is willing to limit its nuclear program; Obama and Park issue sharply worded joint statement after summit meeting condemning North for its record on human rights and for nuclear and ballistic weapons proliferation.
lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea and President Obama also promised to address North Korea’s advancing nuclear and ballistic weapons proliferation.

headline.main: Obama and South Korean Leader Emphasize Unity
headline.print_headline: Obama and South Korean Leader Emphasize Unity

snippet: President Park Geun-hye of South Korea and President Obama also promised to address North Korea’s advancing nuclear and ballistic weapons proliferation.
